overview: An extinct species, the Tasmanian tiger. A long-forgotten legend, “The Pieman” aka Alexander Pearce, who was hanged for cannibalism in 1824. Both had a desperate need to survive; both could have living descendants within the Tasmanian bush.  Four hikers venture deep into isolated territory to find one of these legends, but which one will they come upon first?
tagline: Some species are better off dead.
title: Dying Breed
